header.h2: Setting the Standard for Excellence in Education

img.alt: One Troy
Troy School District

a.title: Powered by Finalsite opens in a new window

img.alt: NO ONE GOES HUNGRY FLYER IMAGE

div.p: Because the status of COVID-19 is rapidly changing both here in the U.S. and abroad, we are continually monitoring the situation and keeping our ONE Troy Community updated regarding the latest novel coronavirus (COVID-19) and the District’s response and procedures. We are in close contact with the Oakland County Health Division and have actively engaged with the Centers for Disease Control (CDC) to ensure that we are following the direction of experts when it comes to safety and preventative measures for our students and staff. We will continue to follow their guidance and best practices to deal with this virus.
div.h2: Together, we can help keep our schools safe!
